function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Poor ventilation efficacy leading to high concentration of viral particles in the room space.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the value of the upper-room uv susceptibility constant for sars-cov-2","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assumption of well-mixed room air may not reflect real-world conditions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of sars-cov-2 through contact with contaminated surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effectiveness of the anti-sars-cov-2 coatings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unknown chemical groups to inactivate sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to cuprous oxide as a pesticide and marine antifoulant","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of systemic toxicity associated with copper exposure","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Contaminated equipment and tools as sources of transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ethanol in the fabrication process","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to argon plasma during cleaning process","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Testing for sars-cov-2 inactivation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to chemicals such as nitric acid and pure gopts","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contamination risk from unattached polymer chains during film fabrication","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of exposure to cu2o particles during film fabrication and testing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of biological testing with sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Handling of infectious materials","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Swift and dramatic inactivation of sars-cov-2 by the cu 2 o/pu coating, reducing the viral titer by 99.9% in 1 hour.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variations in sample preparation and testing leading to differences in the effectiveness of the coating.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to resolve the effects of the polyurethane-only coating, demonstrating the necessity of cu 2 o in the film.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for incomplete inactivation of the virus due to variability in wettability of the cu 2 o/pu film","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain virucidal activity against specific viruses, such as sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to sars-cov-2 virus during testing of the cu 2 o/pu film","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inactivation of sars-cov-2 virus on the coated surface","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cu 2 o/pu film can be removed by heavy deliberate scratching","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cationic polymer coatings did not speed inactivation of sars-cov-2","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential release of sars-cov-2 virus from uncoated samples in the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential failure of other coating technologies amine and ammonium-based polymers to inactivate the virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of mechanical damage to the coating leading to loss of virus-inactivating properties","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of affordable housing and economic hardship leading to eviction and housing displacement","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disproportionate economic hardship and impacts of the virus on low-income and minority communities","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Eviction leading to overcrowding and homelessness","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Evictions and housing displacement leading to increased crowding in residential environments","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Residential crowding and increased contact driving the spread of infectious respiratory illnesses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overcrowding increasing the spread of respiratory infectious diseases in homeless shelters and public facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of covid-19 transmission in transient housing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Weakened immune system due to stress from eviction threat","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Eviction leading to lower access to covid-19 testing and medical attention","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased access to primary and specialty medical care due to eviction","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Traumatizing effect of eviction on children","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health risks associated with eviction","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Racial disparities in eviction risk during covid-19","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher eviction rates for black and non-white households","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Racial wealth gap and lack of emergency funds","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disproportionate impact of covid-19 on people of color","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal death rates for different racial and ethnic groups due to covid-19 disparities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to social distance in low-wage jobs and crowded living conditions","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Repetitive exposure to racism leading to health deterioration and chronic conditions","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Property owners using eviction as rent collection tool","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evictions for small amounts of money","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
